short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submit applications instantly with the Radar AI Assistant.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Radar AI experience with official browser integration that streamlines the application submission process. This extension works seamlessly with your Radar AI account to automatically submit applications to matching job opportunities, saving you hours of time.

Key Features:
- Secure automation of job application submissions
- Seamless integration with your existing Radar AI profile
- Real-time submission tracking
- Works with major job boards and company career pages

The Radar AI Extension is the official companion to the Radar AI platform, designed to complete the automated job application experience. Simply install the extension, sign in with your Radar AI account, and let the intelligent automation handle the rest.

Note: This extension requires an active Radar AI account to function.
